title: 'FRUSTRATING'
body: 'Appears to be a smart invention But heres the catch The sponge is supplied separately n not very easy to attach Returned my first n rcvd replacement Firstly the replaced sponge was still moist as if tried n returned by previous buyer Managed to attach this time but level was not perfect Worked fine but with little extra pressure the sponge falls off Judge for yourself'

title: 'Mess-Free'

title: 'Versatile'
body: Whether it's hardwood, tile, laminate, or linoleum, this mop handles various surfaces with ease. Plus, the adjustable handle allows for a comfortable grip.
